content: Hello! Thank you for contacting XYZ Home Services. How can I help you today?
Hi. My air conditioner is blowing warm air. This is so frustrating. Can you help or not?
I’m sorry to hear that your air conditioner isn’t working properly. I’d be glad to help! May I have your name to get started with scheduling a technician to take a look?
Why do you need my name just to fix it? Can’t you just send someone? Every company always wants my details, and nothing ever gets fixed anyway.

I completely understand that this process can be frustrating, and I want to make it as easy as possible for you. We just need your name and address so our technician knows where to go. Would you be comfortable sharing your address first, and we’ll handle the rest as quickly as possible?
I just feel like this is a waste of time. Every other place I call is either booked out or says they’ll get back to me and never do. Why should I trust this will be any different?

I hear your frustration, and you have every right to want reliable service. At XYZ, we do our best to provide timely and dependable appointments. I can check our earliest availability right now and hold a spot for you. If you’d like, just let me know the address and your preferred times.
Even if you do have a spot, I bet it won’t fit my schedule. And last time I used a service, it took hours for a tech to show up. Do you guarantee arrival times? If not, this is probably pointless.

We always strive to arrive within the window we schedule for you, and I’ll do my best to find a time that matches your needs. Can you let me know what time frames work best for you? That way I can check real-time availability for you immediately.

I’m not sure. My schedule is always up in the air and something always comes up. What do you charge for a basic AC visit anyway? And if it can’t be fixed right away, do I pay a second fee? I don’t want to waste my money.

I appreciate your questions and concerns. I can provide a price estimate for the initial visit, and our technician will explain any costs before doing additional work. Would you like a price estimate before we continue?
I just don’t think anyone is actually going to be helpful. I’ve tried so many places and no one ever fixes the problem. Never mind. I’ll just deal with it myself somehow.
reason: Customer unwilling to continue with scheduling process.
